sentences.text: Irene B. Rosenfeld Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer Three Parkway North Deerfield, IL 60015
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 28, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Shareholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since we spun off our North American grocery business in 2012 and established Mondelz International, the world, and our industry, have undergone a period of unprecedented change.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 was yet another example.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the year, we successfully navigated an extraordinarily volatile and uncertain environment  slower GDP growth globally, especially in emerging markets, currency and commodity volatility, market shocks like the Brexit vote and demonetization in India, as well as complex developments in the political landscape, including a growing backlash against globalization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through it all, we never lost sight of our vision to build the best snacking company in the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In times of rapid change like these, were acting with a sense of urgency to control what we can and create contingencies for what we cannot.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Last year, we continued to sharpen our focus on our core snack categories, our Power Brands and key geographies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also continued to drive down costs by delivering strong net productivity and improving operational efficiencies throughout the business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through these actions, we generated the fuel needed to continue to invest for sustainable growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While were encouraged by our 2016 performance, we also acknowledge that our top-line growth is not yet where we want it to be.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some of this is due to factors outside of our control, e.g., a strong dollar, emerging markets GDP, but some is also attributable to mixed execution on our part or deliberate tradeoffs to make our business more profitable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Not all of our actions will pay off immediately, but we will continue to act boldly and decisively to best position our business for profitable growth over the long term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: More than ever, Im convinced that our results underscore our ability to drive both top- and bottom-line growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: And while todays market realities may present some near-term hurdles, we remain confident in our ability to deliver on our commitments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: YOURE INVITED!
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Im pleased to invite you to our 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will hold the meeting at 9 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CDT on Wednesday, May 17, 2017, at NOAHs Event Venue in Lincolnshire, Illinois.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The venue will open to shareholders at 8 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to attend the meeting, please register in advance by following the instructions included in the Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shareholders of record as of March 8, 2017, are entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the meeting in person, we encourage you to vote in advance in one of three ways:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internet: Visit the website listed on your proxy card/voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Telephone: Call the telephone number on your proxy card/voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mail: Sign, date and return your proxy card in the enclosed envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders will have the opportunity to ask questions or make comments related to the matters being voted on and about our company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They may do so at the times indicated in the meeting agenda and according to the Chairmans instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company will endeavor to answer questions as fully and accurately as possible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To assist us in doing
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: so, shareholders are requested to provide questions in advance of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders can submit questions in two ways:     Internet: Follow the shareholder question link at www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mail: Send your questions to the Corporate Secretary at Mondelz International, Inc., Three Parkway North, Deerfield, Illinois 60015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Questions submitted in advance should be received by the company at least 10 days before the date of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As we prepare for our Annual Meeting of Shareholders, Id like to share some highlights of where weve been and where were going.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DELIVERING COMMITMENTS IN A SLOW-GROWTH WORLD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Im proud that we delivered another year of solid results, and I give tremendous credit to my colleagues around the world for their passion, their commitment and their performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Due to the substantial gain in 2015 from the coffee transactions, our diluted EPS was down 76.4 percent in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, Adjusted EPS(1) increased 24.1 percent on a constant-currency basis, driven by our strong operating performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also reflecting the prior-year gain from the coffee transactions, 2016 operating income margin was 9.9 percent, down 20.1 percentage points.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, Adjusted Operating Income(2) margin expanded 230 basis points to 15.3 percent, due to continued reductions in overhead costs and supply chain productivity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 net revenues were $25.9 billion, down 12.5 percent, driven by the coffee business transactions, deconsolidation of our Venezuelan operations and currency headwinds.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Organic Net Revenue(1) increased 1.3 percent, led by our Power Brands, which grew above category rates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We returned $3.7 billion of cash to our shareholders in 2016 in share repurchases and dividends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since the 2012 launch of the company, weve returned $14.8 billion of cash to our shareholders!
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: WERE BUILDING A COMPANY THAT WILL THRIVE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our strategy is guided by our belief that the best companies have been and will continue to be those with the brands, platforms and capabilities to create sustainable value for shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With our advantaged assets and capabilities, we believe were one of the few industry players with the potential to deliver strong top- and bottom-line growth over the long erm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Were executing on three fronts:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Focus Our Portfolio
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continue to take actions to focus our portfolio on our advantaged snacks categories, which now represent approximately 85 percent of our net revenues, and our Power Brands, like Oreo, belVita, Cadbury Dairy Milk, Milka and Trident, which account for nearly 70 percent of our global revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, we continue to seek opportunities to enhance our capabilities and increase our geographic reach.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Last year, we successfully integrated the Kinh Do snacks business, enabling growth in our $200 million Vietnam business, and we recently announced the divesture of our grocery business in Australia and New Zealand.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also expanded the flexibility and capacity of our allergy-friendly Enjoy Life brand, with the opening of a new, state-of-the-art U.S. manufacturing facility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This increased capacity enabled our recent expansion into the U.K. and Australia.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) See definition under Compensation Discussion and Analysis  Description of Individual Executive Compensation Program Elements  Financial Measure Definitions, the GAAP to Non-GAAP reconciliation in Exhibit A and the section entitled Non-GAAP Financial Measures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: in our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: in our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) See the GAAP to Non-GAAP reconciliation in Exhibit A and the definition in the section entitled Non-GAAP Financial Measures in our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reduce Costs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cost consciousness has become part of our DNA, and were full steam ahead on cost-reduction initiatives that will drive margin expansion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Last year, we delivered best-in-class net productivity thanks to our supply chain reinvention program, while zero-based budgeting and our global shared services initiatives continued to provide meaningful overhead cost savings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These cost savings not only fueled our outstanding shareholder returns, but also enabled us to continue to invest or future growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Weve demonstrated our ability to deliver in tough times, and this strong execution gives me great confidence in our ability to deliver on our 17 to 18 percent Adjusted Operating Income margin target in 2018.(3)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Invest for Growth
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The underlying trends and market dynamics that make snacking attractive globally align well to our strengths.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Were not deterred by the short-term challenges facing our industry and see tremendous growth opportunities ahead of us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We, therefore, continue to leverage our advantaged global footprint and make the necessary investments in our Power Brands nnovation platforms, white-space expansions and route-to-market capabilities so that were well-positioned to accelerate growth as market conditions improve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AS OUR CONSUMERS AND CUSTOMERS CHANGE, WERE CHANGING TOO
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Its no secret: significant global power shifts are redefining the way our consumers live, eat and shop.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: But were not standing on the sidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Were on the field, actively analyzing consumer behavior and the impacts of our tactics and nvestments, and moving quickly and decisively to act on what we learn.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Were following three strategies to accelerate growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Contemporizing Our Core
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Were better connecting our portfolio with todays consumer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: That starts by distorting resources and investment behind our Power Brands, our largest and most profitable trademarks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, these brands continued to outpace category growth, led by Oreo, Milka and belVita.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our investments in 55 manufacturing Lines of the Future around the world over the past three years have not only driven superior margins, but also enabled greater flexibility to meet evolving consumer needs in terms of product forms and packaging formats.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Today, about half of our Power Brands are produced on advantaged assets, up from only 15 percent in 2013 and on our way to approximately 70 percent by 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Contemporizing our core business also means connecting consumers with our iconic brands through bigger, stronger and more disruptive ideas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As we generate more cost savings, were increasing our marketing investments to bring our spending to leadership levels across our categories.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Filling Key White Spaces
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Were expanding our Power Brands and innovation platforms into new geographies and new consumer demand spaces to make our brands available where were underrepresented today.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nowhere is this more important than in the rapid growth of the well-being trend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Everywhere, people have become more attentive to their health and food choices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: So, were renovating our existing products and introducing new ones that fit how consumers define wellness today.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3) The companys outlook for 2018 Adjusted Operating Income margin is a non-GAAP financial measure that excludes or otherwise adjusts for items impacting comparability of financial results such as restructuring activities, acquisitions and divestitures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company is not able to reconcile its full year 2018 projected Adjusted Operating Income margin to its full year 2018 projected reported operating income margin because the company is unable to predict the timing of its Restructuring Program costs, mark-to-market impacts from commodity and forecasted currency transaction derivative contracts and impacts from potential acquisitions or divestitures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, because of the uncertainty and variability of the nature and amount of future adjustments, which could be significant, the company is unable to provide a reconciliation of these measures without unreasonable effort.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Last year, among other initiatives, we launched GOOD THiNS, a delicious snack with no artificial colors and flavors, no high fructose corn syrup and no partially hydrogenated oils.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Were pleased that it was recently named the No. 1 new snacking brand in the U.S.!
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Building on that momentum, 2017 promises to be an unprecedented year for our well-being innovations, extending across all of our categories and all of our regions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recently announced the launch of Va, a new premium well-being brand in the savory biscuit segment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Baked with real ingredients and visible herbs, spices and seeds, the recipes are on trend in every way  no artificial ingredients, colors or flavors, no trans-fat and non- GMO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It will be available in July in the U.S., with additional markets following over time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we also expanded our products into a number of geographic white spaces last year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Were seeing early success from our launches of Milka chocolate in China and the repatriation of our Nabisco biscuit trademarks in Japan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We made a big splash into the $14 billion U.S. chocolate market at the end of last year with the introduction of Milka Oreo chocolate candy bars and Green & Blacks premium chocolate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Driving Selling and Channel Ubiquity eCommerce is emerging as the fastest g
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: eCommerce is emerging as the fastest growing channel in the marketplace.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the retail industry continues to undergo transformation, were expanding sales and distribution capabilities to ensure that our products are available wherever and whenever people shop.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our goal is to build an industry-leading eCommerce snacks business, targeting at least $1 billion in revenue by 2020.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To reach this goal, were investing in stronger capabilities and better infrastructure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This past year, we established a dedicated cross-functional team of experienced talent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We improved data analytics, supply chain and digital technologies, optimized our content and search as well as invested in compelling programs to increase traffic.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As were implementing these strategies, were also accelerating our momentum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Last year, eCommerce net revenues grew more than 35 percent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beyond eCommerce, were also boosting our presence in higher growth brick-and-mortar channels, including discounters and convenience stores in developed markets as well as traditional trade outlets in emerging markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GROWING OUR POSITIVE IMPACT ON THE WORLD AROUND US
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At Mondelz International, our growth is directly linked to enhancing the well-being of the people who make and enjoy our products, the communities we serve and our planet as a whole.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Weve launched innovative, industry-leading programs in key commodities like cocoa, wheat and palm oil.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 10-year, $400 million Cocoa Life program is empowering more than 200,000 farmers and improving the lives of more than 1 million people in key origin markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Last year, we announced that the Cocoa Life program would be extended to all Cadbury products by 2019, including those that are currently Fairtrade-certified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the first time ever, all Cadbury products will be covered by a single sustainable sourcing program  giving our consumers the confidence that whenever they buy a Cadbury chocolate bar, it will not only taste good but make a difference too.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (4) Nielsen Global and H&W Trend Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to wheat production, our Harmony program promotes biodiversity and good environmental practices across Europe.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of wheat farmers committed to follow Harmony agricultural practices  covering the cultivation process from seed to crop  continues to grow.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The initial group of 68 farmers in France is now a partnership of more than 1,700 farmers across the continent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In palm oil, we took steps last year to advance our goal to make sustainable palm oil the mainstream option, based on the principles that production should be on legally held land, not lead to deforestation or loss of peat land, respect human rights and not use forced or child labor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of our updated Palm Oil Action Plan, we laid out new milestones and requirements for suppliers to work toward a sustainable supply of palm oil.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key new provisions require suppliers to map and assess the risk for all supplying mills on Global Forest Watch, provide assurance that no deforestation occurs on their own concessions and exclude third-party suppliers who do not immediately cease deforestation and work with recognized third-party experts to protect labor rights.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recognize concerns for the welfare of egg-laying chickens and, last year, we announced our decision to fully transition to cage-free eggs in the United States and Canada by 2020 and in Europe by 2025.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This move followed years of progress in sustainable and responsible sourcing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Helping Consumers Make Mindful Choices with Clear Nutrition Labeling
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To make informed, mindful decisions for themselves and their families, consumers need the right nutritional information delivered in a simple and straightforward manner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Were committed to helping our consumers be mindful of how many calories they are taking in and are working to provide clear information about our snacks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the U.S., were part of SmartLabel, an initiative created by manufacturers and retailers to enable consumers to get additional details about our products.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As such, this year, we were one of the first companies to launch a SmartLabel app, providing in-store, on-the-spot access to detailed product information for many of our snacking products on smartphones.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In Europe, we recently announced our support for a pan-European color-coded front-of-pack labeling plan in response to consumer demand for better clarity and more understandable nutritional information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Well be working with five other multinationals to put in place a robust European approach to help consumers make balanced and mindful choices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE PATH AHEAD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, our advantaged business model enabled us to deliver another year of Adjusted OI margin expansion, Adjusted EPS growth and strong capital returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Im proud of and inspired by our talented colleagues around the world and proud of our management team for successfully navigating through another challenging environment and continuing to deliver more moments of joy to all of our stakeholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Snacking remains an attractive space for growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Its a $1.2 trillion market, and while near-term growth may be muted, the underlying trends indicate considerable runway for our categories to expand further.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: But I also know that we must do more if we want to be the best snacking company in the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: So when the macro picture improves  and were confident it will  the foundation were laying today will position us to leverage the investments weve made to deliver balanced and sustainable growth on both the top and bottom lines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of our leadership team and our Mondelz International colleagues around the world, I thank you for another year of support of our company, and for your belief in our future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Best regards,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Forward-Looking Statements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This letter to shareholders contains a number of forward-looking statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Words, and variations of words, such as will, expect, believe, would, position, deliver, commitment, target and similar expressions are intended to identify our forward-looking statements, including, but not limited to, statements about: our future performance, including our future revenue growth, earnings per share and margins; execution of our strategy, including our growth strategies; category growth; market conditions; new products; innovation; our investments and the results of those investments; growth in and revenues from e-commerce; our well-being initiatives; shareholder value; and our outlook, including 2018 Adjusted Operating Income margin.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These forward-looking statements are subject to a number of risks and uncertainties, many of which are beyond our control, which could cause our actual results to differ materially from those indicated in our forward looking statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such factors include, but are not limited to, risks from operating globally including in emerging markets; changes in currency exchange rates, controls and restrictions; continued volatility of commodity and other input costs; weakness in economic conditions; weakness in consumer spending; pricing actions; unanticipated disruptions to our business; competition; the restructuring program and our other transformation initiatives not yielding the anticipated benefits; changes in the assumptions on which the restructuring program is based; and tax law changes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please also see our risk factors, as they may be amended from time to time, set forth in our filings with the SEC, including our most recently filed Annual Report on Form 10-K.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mondelz International disclaims and does not undertake any obligation to update or revise any forward-looking statement in this letter to shareholders, except as required by applicable law or regulation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Composition: Competencies, Diversity, Refreshment and Tenure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The composition of the Board taken as a whole enables the Board to represent effectively all shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All 13 director nominees have the personal attributes including integrity, sound business judgement and vision necessary to establish a competent, ethical and well-functioning board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the individual director nominees have a variety of backgrounds and experiences that provide the Board with the key competencies needed for the Board to fulfill its current and future obligations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Industry Knowledge, Product Development and Marketing Experience: 12 of 13 director nominees have significant experience at food and beverage, consumer products and services, or manufacturing companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Operating and Leadership Experience at Complex Organizations: All director nominees have significant strategic, general management and operating experience at major companies or institutions  many with international reach.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: International Business Experience and Global Perspectives: Over half of the director nominees are living and working or have lived and worked outside of his or her home country; several have lived and worked in multiple countries and on multiple continents.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accounting and Financial Management Experience: All director nominees have financial oversight and management experience; four were chief financial officers of major public companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Public Company Board and Corporate Governance Experience: All director nominees bring a range of experiences serving on various public company boards or with public company boards in their leadership roles at public companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Academic, Leadership and Research Experience: Dr. Simmons brings experience from her distinguished career as a scholar and leader in higher education.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Diversity:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Four of the director nominees are women, including the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director nominees range in age from 55 to 75 (as of March 8, 2017)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director nominees represent varied races, national origins and geographic locations and possess diverse life and professional experiences.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Refreshment and Tenure of Independent Director Nominees (as of March 8, 2017):
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Five of the independent director nominees served as directors before the Company spun-off Kraft Foods Group, Inc. to our shareholders on October 1, 2012; 7 joined the Board on or after October 1, 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tenure Range: Less than 1 year to 10 years
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Average Tenure: 5 years
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Median Tenure: 3.8 years
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Highlights (Pages 19 and 36 and 91 of this Proxy Statement)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that a strong and balanced corporate governance framework is essential to the Companys long-term success because it promotes the long-term interests of shareholders, accountability and trust in the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We highlight here key aspects of the Companys corporate governance framework.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders can find additional detail under Corporate Governance beginning on page 19 of this Proxy Statement under Compensation Discussion and Analysis  Our Executive Compensation Design Principles and Governance Practices Reflect Best Practices to Protect and Promote our Shareholders Interests on page 36 of this Proxy Statement, and under 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders on page 91.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Board, committee and director self- assessments include feedback on individual director performance through candid one-on-one discussions between the Governance Committee Chair and each director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual election of directors (i.e., no staggered Board)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy access by-law provisions and shareholders may recommend director candidates for the Governance Committees consideration
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Focus on Board refreshment, including via term limits and retirement policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority and confidential voting in uncontested Director Elections with director resignation policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No supermajority voting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Limits on directors service on other public company boards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders of at least 20% of the voting power of the outstanding Common Stock may call a special meeting of shareholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board annually reviews the Strategic Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board and committees oversee enterprise-wide risk management activities
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No poison pill (shareholder rights plan)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Highly independent Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman and CEO is the only member of management to serve as a director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The appropriate Board committees annually evaluate the Chairman and CEOs performance and suitability to serve as Chairman of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All committee chairs and committee members are independent
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock ownership guidelines and retention policies for both directors and executives
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent leadership of the Boards work.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Lead Director has expansive substantive responsibilities and powers, including approval of meeting schedules and agendas
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Anti-hedging, anti-short sale and anti-pledging policies for both directors and executive officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clawback policy allows recoupment of executive compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead Director presides at the frequent meetings of independent directors in executive session
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long-standing commitment to sustainability including Board committee oversight of environmental, social and governance matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of our ongoing shareholder engagement, Lead Director is available for consultation with our major shareholders

sentences.text: Compensation Goals
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources and Compensation Committee (the Compensation Committee) has four primary goals for our executive compensation program:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Attract, retain and motivate talented executive officers and develop world-class business leaders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. Support business strategies that promote superior long-term shareholder returns;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Align pay and performance by making a significant portion of our Named Executive Officers (NEOs) compensation dependent on achieving financial and other critical strategic and individual goals; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. Align our NEOs and shareholders interests through equity-based incentive grants that link executive compensation to sustained and superior Total Shareholder Return(1) (TSR) and stock ownership requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Design
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We design our executive compensation program to achieve these goals by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Linking pay to performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Putting pay at risk based on short-term and long-term performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rewarding long-term sustainable performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Targeting pay at or near the median of our peer group;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Setting substantive performance goals; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Requiring executive officers to acquire and hold a significant amount of Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Executive Compensation Reflected the Performance of our NEOs and the Company
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Cash Incentive Program
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We achieved an above target financial performance rating of 123% under the 2016 Annual Cash Incentive Program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Despite the challenging top-line environment, we generated strong earnings growth and margin expansion driven by strong operating performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After accounting for financial and individual performance, the awards our NEOs earned were generally slightly above target performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Share Units (2014-2016 Performance Cycle)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We achieved an above target performance rating of 106% for the performance share unit awards subject to the 2014-2016 performance cycle.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We performed above target on two of the three performance measures  Adjusted Return on Invested Capital Increase and Annualized Relative TSR.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We performed below threshold on Organic Net Revenue Growth (as defined on page 54 of this proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can find detailed information about our compensation programs and decisions in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis beginning on page 36 and Executive Compensation Tables beginning on page 60 of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends that shareholders vote to continue annual (ONE YEAR) advisory votes to approve executive compensation (commonly known as say-on-pay votes).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that annual advisory say-on-pay votes provide the Company timely, direct shareholder input regarding our compensation philosophy, policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An annual (ONE YEAR) advisory say-on-pay vote is consistent with our practice of seeking input from and regularly engaging with our shareholders on corporate governance matters and our executive compensation program.

sentences.text: In Memory of Stephen Frasier Bollenbach 1942  2016
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On October 8, 2016, the Board lost a great friend and remarkable colleague.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Steve Bollenbach joined the Board in October 2012, when the Company spun off its North American grocery business to create Kraft Foods Group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: His remarkable career in the family entertainment, media, hospitality, real estate and financial services industries, included senior roles at a number of major companies, among them Marriott Corporation, The Walt Disney Company and Hilton Hotels Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While serving on the Companys Board, he used his vast knowledge and experience to make many contributions to the Companys success and the Boards effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He was relied upon to share powerful insights, distill complex situations, ask tough questions and, always, to speak his mind.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is missed greatly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Process for Nominating Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee identifies, evaluates and recommends to the Board director nominees for election at the Annual Meeting (and any adjournments or postponements of the Annual Meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee invites director nominee suggestions from the directors, management, shareholders and others.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Governance Committee has retained a third-party executive search firm to assist it in identifying and evaluating potential director nominees based on the Boards recruitment objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Qualifications for Nomination to the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes all directors should possess certain attributes, including integrity, sound business judgment and vision as these characteristics are necessary to establish a competent, ethical and well-functioning board that best represents shareholders interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with the Corporate Governance Guidelines (the Guidelines), when evaluating the suitability of an individual fo nomination, the Governance Committee considers that individuals:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: general understanding of the varied disciplines relevant to the success of a large, publicly traded company in todays global business environment;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: understanding of the Companys global businesses and markets; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: professional expertise and educational background.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee also considers:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: other factors that promote diversity of views, knowledge and experience, including, among others, gender, race and national origin;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: whether the individual meets various independence requirements, including whether an individuals service on boards and committees of other organizations is consistent with our conflicts of interest policy; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: whether the individual can devote sufficient time and effort to fulfill his or her responsibilities to the Company given the individuals other commitments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Composition: Director Competencies, Experiences and Expertise
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee works with the Board to determine the appropriate mix of competencies that will result in a Board that is strong in its collective knowledge, enabling the Board to fulfill its responsibilities and best perpetuate the Companys long-term success and represent all shareholders interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based upon its discussions with the Board, the Governance Committee has identified these key competencies that are particularly desirable in order for the Board to fulfill ts current and future obligations:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key Competencies   Relevant Experience Industry Knowledge vital to understanding and reviewing strategy, including the acquisition of businesses that offer complementary products or services          Food and Beverage          Consumer Products Significant Operating Experience as current or former executives of large global companies or other large organizations giving directors specific insight into and expertise that will foster active participation in the development and implementation of the Companys operating plan and business strategy          CEO/COO          Best in Class  Manufacturing Operations          Best in Class  Retail Operations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committees director recruitment planning considers both the evolving needs of the Company and Board as well as the impact of anticipated departures on the Boards future composition and leadership of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on that work, the Committee most recently sought to identify and recruit a sitting or recently retired CEO of a global manufacturing company with significant experience in cost management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: That search identified Charles E. Bunch, who has significant experience in cost management and is a highly capable global executive and seasoned public company director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Bunch was recommended to the Governance Committee as a potential director by Nelson Peltz, an incumbent non-employee director, and also by the Governance Committees consultant in connection with the Governance Committees search.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board appointed Mr. Bunch effective September 1, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Individual Director Self-Assessments and Considerations for Renomination of Incumbent Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee coordinates annual Board, committee and director self-assessments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The assessment process includes one-on-one discussions between each director and the Chair of the Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annually, the director nominees complete questionnaires to update and confirm their background, qualifications and skills and identify any potential conflicts of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee assesses the experience, qualifications, attributes, skills, diversity and contributions of each director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee also considers each individual in the context of the Board composition as a whole, with the objective of recruiting and recommending a slate of director nominees who can best perpetuate the Companys success and represent our shareholders interests through the exercise of sound judgment and informed decision-making.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Refreshment, Director Tenure and Age Limits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that its composition should provide continuity as well as new experiences and fresh perspectives relevant to the Boards work.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board does not believe that directors should expect to be automatically renominated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, the annual Board and director self-assessment processes are important determinants in a directors renomination and tenure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, as amended during 2016, the Guidelines provide that:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All non-employee directors will have a term limit of 15 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-employee directors will not be nominated for election to the Board after their 75th birthday.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if a non-employee director aged 70 to 75 is appointed or elected to the Board, then that director w have a term limit of five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The current Board composition reflects the Boards commitment to ongoing refreshment: five of the independent director nominees served as directors before we spun-off Kraft Foods Group, Inc. to shareholders on October 1, 2012; seven joined the Board on or after October 1, 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Diversity
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mondelz International has cross-cultural and diverse employees manufacturing and marketing delicious snack food and beverage products for consumers in approximately 165 countries around the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board embraces and encourages the Companys and Boards culture of diversity and inclusion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although the Board does not establish specific goals with respect to diversity, the Boards overall diversity is an important consideration in the director recruitment and nomination process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Guidelines provide that when evaluating the suitability of individuals for nomination, the Governance Committee considers criteria including, among others, gender, ace and national origin as they promote diversity of views, knowledge and experience that contribute to a more informed and effective decision-making process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of its annual assessment of the Boards composition, the Governance Committee assesses the effectiveness of the Boards efforts to promote diversity in all its forms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Four of the director nominees are women, including the Chairman and CEO; the director nominees represent varied ages (as of March 8, 2017): 55 to 75, races and national origins, and bring diverse life and professional experiences.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee Welcomes Shareholder Recommendations for Candidates for Election to the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee will consider recommendations for director candidates submitted by a shareholder(s).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shareholder(s) should submit to the Corporate Secretary both the recommended candidates name along with the same information required for a shareholder to nominate a candidate for election to the Board at an Annual Meeting and in the same manner as set forth in the advance notice provisions of the Companys By-Laws (the By-Laws).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee evaluates director candidates recommended by shareholder(s) using the same criteria as it uses to evaluate candidates whom the Governance Committee identifies (described above).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee makes a recommendation to the Board regarding the candidates appointment or nomination for election to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board considers the Governance Committees recommendation, and then decides whether to appoint or nominate the candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Secretary advises the shareholder(s) of the Boards decision whether to appoint or nominate the candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders Elect Directors Annually
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each member of the Board is elected annually by a majority of votes cast (if the election is uncontested).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The terms of all directors elected at the 2017 Annual Meeting will end at the 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders or when a directors successor has been duly elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee recommended and the Board nominated for election at the 2017 Annual Meeting each of the 13 incumbent directors listed below under  Director Nominees for Election at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Of the 13 director nominees standing for election, shareholders elected 12 to one-year terms at the 2016 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board appointed Mr. Bunch, the 13th director nominee, to the Board effective September 1, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Bollenbach, whom shareholders elected at the 2016 Annual Meeting of Shareholders, passed away in October 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director nominee consented to his or her nomination for election to the Board and to serving on the Board, if elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a director nominee should become unavailable to serve as a director, the persons named as proxies intend to vote the shares for a replacement director nominee designated by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In lieu of naming a substitute, the Board may reduce the number of directors on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that each director nominee for election at the Annual Meeting is highly qualified.

sentences.text: All 13 director nominees satisfy the criteria stated in the Guidelines and possess the personal attributes essential for the proper and effective functioning of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LEWIS W.K. BOOTH, Former Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Ford Motor Company
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director since October 2012; Independent
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Booth, 68, served as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of the Ford Motor Company (Ford), a global automobile manufacturer, from November 2008 until his retirement in April 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He was Executive Vice President of Ford of Europe, Volvo Car Corporation and Ford Export Operations and Global Growth Initiatives, and Executive Vice President of Fords Premier Automotive Group from October 2005 to October 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that, Mr. Booth held various executive leadership positions with Ford, including Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Ford of Europe, President of Mazda Motor Corporation and President of Ford Asia Pacific and Africa Operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He worked for Ford in various positions from 1978 to 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Booth was appointed Commander of the Order of the British Empire in June 2012 for his services to the United Kingdoms automotive and manufacturing industries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During his career at Ford, Mr. Booth gained global business experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He led operations in Africa, Asia and Europe.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In these and other roles, he successfully implemented major growth initiatives, business restructuring and cost management and was involved in strategy, product development, marketing and operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Booth held a variety of positions in Fords Finance staff.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Fords Chief Financial Officer during the 2008 financial crisis, Mr. Booth led a restructuring of Fords balance sheet and a return to growth and profitability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Booth is a Chartered Management Accountant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Booth also has extensive public company board and corporate governance experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is a director of Gentherm Incorporated and Rolls-Royce Holdings plc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CHARLES E. BUNCH, Former Executive Chairman, PPG Industries, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director since September 2016; Independent
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Bunch, 67, served as Executive Chairman of PPG Industries, Inc. (PPG), a manufacturer and distributor of a broad range of coatings, specialty materials and glass products, from September 2015 until his retirement in August 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He served as Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer from July 2005 until August 2015; President and Chief Executive Officer from March 2005 until July 2005; and President and Chief Operating Officer from July 2002 to March 2005; Executive Vice President, Coatings from 2000 to 2002 and Senior Vice President, Strategic Planning and Corporate Services from 1997 to 2000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He joined PPG in 1979 and held various positions in finance and planning, marketing, and general management in the United States and Europe.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During his 37 year career at PPG, he gained valuable experience in executive leadership, operations management, cost management, and strategic planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Bunchs leadership, PPG accelerated its business transformation, becoming the worlds leading paints and coatings company through strategic actions that focused its business portfolio, and that expanded and strengthened its international presence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During his tenure as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, PPG made more than 30 acquisitions and delivered strong growth and record financial performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through his experience at the Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland, including serving as its Chairman, Mr. Bunch gained a deep understanding of the U.S. economy and corporate finance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Bunch also has extensive public company board and corporate governance experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is a director of Marathon Petroleum Corporation, ConocoPhilips and The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. and a former director of H.J. Heinz Company and PPG.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With her deep knowledge of digital commerce, Ms. Shi grew Nikes digital commerce capabilit
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that having and adhering to a strong corporate governance framework is essential to our long-term success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This section describes our governance policies, key practices, Board leadership structure and oversight functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Governance Documents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To learn more about our corporate governance practices, you can access the following corporate governance documents at www.mondelezinternational.com/investors/corporate-governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will also provide copies of any of these documents to shareholders upon written request to the Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Governance Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board adopted the Guidelines articulating our governance philosophy, practices and policies in a range of areas, including: the Boards role and responsibilities; Board composition and structure; responsibilities of the committees of the Board; CEO and Board performance evaluations; and succession planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At least annually, the Governance Committee reviews the Guidelines and recommends any changes to the Board for its consideration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    19
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key Elements of Corporate Governance Framework
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The By-Laws provide that the shareholders elect all directors annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Access By-Law Provisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key parameters:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Minimum Ownership Threshold: 3% or more of the outstanding Common Stock;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ownership Duration: continuously for at least 3 years;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominating Group Size: no more than 20 shareholders may aggregate holdings to meet the minimum ownership threshold; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maximum Nominations Permitted: greater of 20% of the Board or 2 nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority and Confidential Voting in Uncontested Director Elections with a Director Resignation Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The By- Laws provide that, in an election in which the number of nominees for election equals the number of directors to be elected, director nominees must be elected by a majority of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Special Meetings of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The By-Laws allow shareholders of record of at least 20% of the voting power of the outstanding stock to call a special meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Limitation on Management Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Guidelines provide that the Chairman and CEO generally should b the only member of management to serve as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director, Committee and Board Independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 12 of the 13 director nominees are independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Board committees consist entirely of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (See  Director Independence on page 22 for more information about the Boards process for determining director independence.)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Leadership Structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An independent director serves as Lead Director and has expansive substantive responsibilities and powers, including approval of meeting schedules and agendas;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent directors chair the Boards four standing committees; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CEO serves as Chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See additional discussion below under  Board Leadership Structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Sessions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At each in-person Board meeting, the independent directors meet without the CEO or any other members of management present to discuss substantive issues important to the Company, including matters concerning management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, the Lead Director chairs these sessions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A committee chair leads Board discussion of a topic relevant to that committees remit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Board, Committee and Director Self-Assessments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In consultation with the Lead Director, the Governance Committee establishes and oversees processes for annual Board and committee self- assessments and coordinates individual director self-assessments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The directors self-evaluation process includes candid, one-on-one discussions between the Chair of the Governance Committee and each independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board, committees and management use the results of these self-assessments in planning their work, ensuring director accountability, Board composition analysis and director recruitment decisions, governance decisions, and planning meetings and agendas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Engagement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with our shareholder engagement philosophy, we engage with shareholders to seek their input on emerging issues and to address their questions and concerns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the year, we engaged with a diverse mix of shareholders on a wide range of topics including, among others, strategy, capital allocation, business performance, executive compensation, corporate governance, sustainability and corporate social responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These exchanges were candid and constructive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Director is available for consultation with our major shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strategic Planning and Risk Oversight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annually, the Board meets with management to discuss, understand and challenge our strategic plans short-term and long-term objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At its meetings during the balance of the year, the Board and management track progress against the strategic plans goals, consider opportunities in light of circumstances in the food and beverage industry and the economic environment, and monitor strategic and operational risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys goals and executive compensation design are tied to a number of metrics critical to achieving the strategic plan and promoting long-term shareholder returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: More generally, the Board is responsible for oversight of strategy, broad corporate policy and overall performance of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Company through engaged oversight of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    20
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See  Oversight of Risk Management below for additional information about the Boards important role in risk oversight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Chairman and CEO Evaluation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee annually evaluates the Chairman and CEOs performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee seeks input from the other directors regarding her performance before deciding her performance rating and compensation actions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Stock Ownership Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To promote alignment of directors and shareholders interests, we expect directors to hold Common Stock in an amount equal to five times the annual Board retainer within five years of joining the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of March 8, 2017, all directors with at least five years of service on the Board met or exceeded this requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity grants made to directors on or after May 2010 take the form of deferred stock units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Distribution of actual shares occurs six months after the director ends his or her service as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Special Meetings of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The By-Laws empower either the Lead Director or the Chairman to call special meetings of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Limits on Board Memberships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Guidelines provide that a director who is also a sitting CEO should not serve on the boards of directors of more than two public companies, including the Companys Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other directors should not serve on the boards of directors of more than four public companies, including the Companys Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our directors are in compliance with this policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The By-Laws provide the Board flexibility in determining its leadership structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board may appoint and designate the duties of a Lead Director and permit one person to hold the offices of both Chairman and CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Within that framework, the Board annually re-evaluates its leadership structure to determine the most appropriate leadership structure at that time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering which leadership structure will allow it to most effectively carry out its responsibilities and best represent shareholders interests, the Board takes into account various factors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among them are our specific business needs, our operating and financial performance, industry conditions, economic and regulatory environments, the results of Board and committee annual self-assessments, the advantages and disadvantages of alternative leadership structures based on circumstances at that time and our corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In keeping with this principle, the Board may determine that the CEO also serves as Chairman, but if it does so, it also appoints an independent Lead Director with substantive responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Current Leadership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An independent director, Mr. Ketchum, serves as Lead Director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent directors chair the Boards four standing committees; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CEO, Ms. Rosenfeld, serves as Chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that this leadership structure provides an effective balance of strong leadership and independent oversight and best meets the Boards current circumstances and anticipated needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also believes that this eadership structure enhances its oversight of risk management because the CEO, who is ultimately responsible for the Companys risk management process, is in the best position as Chairman to discuss with the Board key risks and managements responses to them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Director Leadership and Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that independent Board leadership and oversight are very important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, it established the substantive and expansive position of independent Lead Director for times when one individual serves as both Chairman and CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors annually select the Lead Director for a one-year term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board created the Lead Director position to provide independent leadership of the Boards affairs on behalf of shareholders, increase the Boards effectiveness, promote open communication amongst the independent directors and serve as the principal liaison between the Chairman and the other independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    21
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead Director Role and Responsibilities
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: nder the Guidelines, the Lead Director, in consultation with the other independent directors, has the following duties and sponsibilities:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Serve as liaison between the independent directors and the Chairman and CEO;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Seek input from the independent directors and advise the Chairman and CEO as to an appropriate annual schedule of and major agenda topics and content of related briefing materials for regular Board meetings prior to Board review and approval;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review and approve meeting agenda as well as the content of Board briefing materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review and approve the allocation of time amongst the Board and committee meetings;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Preside at Board meetings at which the Chairman and CEO is not present, including executive sessions of the independent directors and, as appropriate, apprise the Chairman of the topics considered;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Call meetings of the independent directors or of the Board as needed;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Facilitate effective communication and interaction between the Board and management;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Serve as an ex-officio non-voting member of all Board committees of which he or she is not
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provide input into the design of the annual Board, committee and director self-evaluations;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Working with the Governance Committee, develop recommendations for committee structure, membership, rotations and chairs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Be available for consultation with the Companys major shareholders; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Perform such other duties as the Board may from time to time delegate to the Lead Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Ketchum is the Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors first appointed him to that role in 2009 and have re-appointed him annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors believe that he is an effective Lead Director due to his independence, leadership, global operating experience and corporate governance experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Chairman and CEO Role and Responsibilities
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Rosenfeld has served as the CEO and as a director since June 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In conjunction with the Companys 2007 spin-off from Altria Group, Inc., the Board concluded that Ms. Rosenfeld should also serve as Chairman because of her extensive knowledge of the Company, the food industry and the competitive environment in which we operate, her leadership experience and her ability and dedication to working closely with the Lead Director and the other independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on current circumstances and anticipated needs, the Board continues to believe that having Ms. Rosenfeld serve as both Chairman and CEO promotes shareholders interests and contributes to the Boards efficiency and effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that she is generally in the best position to inform the independent directors about our global operations and critical business matters including the Companys risk management process, and ensure alignment of our business and strategic plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, the Board believes that combining these roles also expedites communication between Ms. Rosenfeld and the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All directors are independent except for Ms. Rosenfeld, our Chairman and CEO
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board determined that, under the Boards categorical standards and NASDAQs listing standards, the following directors are independent: Lewis W.K. Booth, Charles E. Bunch, Lois D. Juliber, Mark D. Ketchum, Jorge S. Mesquita, Joseph Neubauer, Nelson Peltz, Fredric G. Reynolds, Christiana S. Shi, Patrick T. Siewert, Ruth J. Simmons and Jean- Franois M. L. van Boxmeer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Stephen F. Bollenbach was independent during the portion of 2016 he served on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Irene B. Rosenfeld is not independent because she is a Mondelz International employee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Guidelines require that at least 80% of the directors meet the NASDAQ listing standards independence requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to determine that a director is independent, the Board must affirmatively determine, after reviewing all relevant nformation, that a director has no relationship with Mondelz International or any of its subsidiaries that would interfere with the exercise of independent judgment in carrying out the responsibilities of a
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    22
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To assist in this determination, the Board adopted categorical standards of director independence, including whether a director or a member of the directors immediate family has any current or past employment or affiliation with Mondelz International or the independent registered public accountants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These standards are generally consistent with the NASDAQ listing standards independence requirements.
