sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The narrative and tables below describe the potential payments to each NEO upon certain terminations, including following a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with SEC rules, all information described in this section is presented as if the triggering events occurred on December 31, 2016, except for Mr. Abelenda.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information for Mr. Abelenda reflects his retirement in accordance with the terms of his Retirement Agreement and General Release entered into on December 31, 2016 (Retirement Agreement).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Retirement Agreement, Mr. Abelenda retired effective January 1, 2017 with his last day of active employment with the Company (Last Day Worked) on December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to his Retirement Agreement, upon his departure, Mr. Abelenda received or will receive the following: a full 2016 AIP award at actual Company performance and target individual performance based on his full-time service from January 1, 2016 through December 31, 2016; a full share award for performance share units (PSUs) subject to the 2014-2016 and 2015-2017 performance cycles, if any, based on actual Company performance against the applicable performance goals and a prorated share award for PSUs subject to the 2016-2018 performance cycle, if any, based on actual Company performance against the applicable performance goals and prorated based on 19 months (out of a total of 36 months); retirement eligibility for purposes of stock options; full vesting of his unvested 2014 restricted stock grant following the Last Day Worked, which would otherwise vest in February 2017; and participation in retirement and benefits plans available to U.S. employees generally.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Abelenda is also subject to certain restrictive covenants for a twelve-month period through December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The restrictive covenants include the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) he will not, without our prior written approval, work for, or provide services, directly or indirectly, to specified competitors; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) he will not, directly or indirectly, solicit our employees to work for another entity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Mr. Abelenda provided a general release of any claims arising out of his employment, will maintain the confidentiality of our proprietary information and will not disparage or discredit us or any of our affiliates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Involuntary Termination Without Cause (Non-Change in Control Event)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We generally do not have existing employment or separation agreements with our NEOs that dictate the terms of the NEOs departure from the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, in the event an NEO is involuntarily terminated without cause outside of a change in control event, we would expect that in most cases the Compensation Committee would offer separation benefits as consideration for protections we would likely seek  such as a release of claims and entering into non-compete, non- solicitation and confidentiality agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For U.S. salaried employees, we maintain a severance plan that provides severance pay of up to 12 months based on service where the employees job is eliminated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We would expect to treat our NEOs at least comparably to other U.S. salaried employees who are involuntarily terminated without cause.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Treatment of PSU Grants           Outstanding PSU grants are generally forfeited, however, our Compensation Committee may exercise discretion to vest some or all of the awards subject to actual Company performance for the full performance cycle.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, for employees, including NEOs, eligible for retirement (minimum age 55 with at least ten years of service), their PSU grants made on or after February 22, 2016 pro rata vest, subject to actual Company performance, based on the number of months of active employment during the applicable performance cycle.

sentences.text: Treatment of Restricted Stock or Deferred Stock Unit Grants           Outstanding restricted stock and deferred stock unit grants are generally forfeited, however, our Compensation Committee may exercise discretion to accelerate vesting of some or all of the awards.

sentences.text: Treatment of Stock Options           Unvested stock option grants are generally forfeited, however, our Compensation Committee may exercise discretion to accelerate vesting of some or all of the awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in Control Arrangements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NEOs are not eligible for any benefit solely upon a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain the CIC Plan for senior executive officers, including the NEOs, which provides for certain benefits upon an involuntary termination of employment without Cause or voluntary termination for Good Reason within two years following a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To receive any benefits under the CIC Plan, a participant must execute and abide by certain restrictive covenants, including a non-compete and non-solicitation for one year following termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, the Mondelz International, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amended and Restated 2005 Performance Incentive Plan (the Equity Plan) also provides for the treatment of unassumed outstanding equity grants following a change in control and assumed outstanding equity grants upon an involuntary termination of employment without Cause or voluntary termination for Good Reason within two years following a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The key elements of the CIC Plan and Equity Plan assuming a double trigger event are described in the table below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plan Element   Description Definition of Change in Control   Subject to certain exceptions, the occurrence of one of the conditions below:          Acquisition of 20% or more of our outstanding voting securities;          Changes to Board membership during any consecutive 24-month period that results in less than 50% of the current Board members elected to the Board;          After the reorganization, merger, statutory share exchange or consolidation or any other material transaction involving the Company or any of our subsidiaries, over 50% of outstanding voting securities are not owned by Company shareholders; or          Complete liquidation of Mondelz International or the sale of all or substantially all of our assets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Definition of Cause          Continued failure to substantially perform the participants job duties (other than resulting from incapacity due to disability);          Gross negligence, dishonesty or violation of any reasonable rule or regulation of the Company where the violation results in significant damage to the Company; or          Engaging in other conduct which adversely reflects on Company in any material respect.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Definition of Good Reason          Material reduction in job duties;          Material reduction in compensation;          Relocation beyond 50 miles; or          Failure to assume the obligations under the CIC Plan or Equity Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Severance and Benefits Amounts          CEO: 2.99 times base salary plus target annual incentive;          All other NEOs: two times base salary plus target annual incentive;          Additional credited years of pension service (if applicable) and welfare benefits equal to three years for the CEO and two years for the other NEOs;          Continuation of financial counseling and car allowances for three years for the CEO and two years for the other NEOs; and          Outplacement services up to two years following the termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Treatment of AIP Awards and PSU Grants          NEO is eligible to receive cash payments representing the NEOs award under the AIP and the NEOs outstanding PSU grants paid at target levels, each on a pro rata basis for service during the performance cycle, except where at least fifty percent of the performance cycle has elapsed for outstanding PSUs resulting in a cash payment equal to the target level.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Treatment of Equity Grants          Restricted stock, deferred stock units and unvested stock option grants vest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants have the full-term to exercise all stock options, including those previously vested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maximum CIC Plan Benefit/No Gross Up for Payment of Excise Tax          The maximum benefit under the CIC Plan or otherwise is the greater of the full benefit or a reduced benefit that does not trigger the excise tax under Code Section 4999 as determined on an after-tax basis for each.

sentences.text: Section 16(a) Beneficial Ownership Reporting Compliance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 16(a) of the Exchange Act requires executive officers, directors and persons who beneficially own more than 10% of Common Stock to report to the SEC their ownership of Common Stock and changes in that ownership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We reviewed copies of reports filed pursuant to Section 16(a) of the Exchange Act and written representations from reporting persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based solely on that review, we believe that for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016, all required reports under Section 16(a) were filed on a timely basis, except:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2016, a Form 3 was filed underreporting Mr. Brusadellis holdings of Mondelz International stoc by 20,401 shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon discovery of the error, an amended Form 3 reporting these shares was filed in February 2016;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A report was not timely filed for the cancellation in April 2016 of 740 deferred stock units indirectly held by Mr. Brusadelli.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Form 4 was filed in February 2017 upon discovery of the oversight; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In September 2016, a Form 3 was filed underreporting Mr. Bunchs holdings of Mondelz International stock by 314 shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon discovery of the error, an amended Form 3 reporting these shares was filed in February 2017.

sentences.text: ITEM 2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratification of the Selection of Independent Registered Public Accountants for Fiscal Year 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is directly responsible for the selection, appointment, compensation, retention, oversight and termination of the independent registered public accountants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee selected PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, a registered public accounting firm, as the independent registered public accountants for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    75
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP have been the Companys independent registered public accountants since 2001.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is responsible for the audit fee negotiations associated with the retention of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to assure auditor independence, the Audit Committee continues to periodically consider whether there should be regular rotation of the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, in conjunction with the regular rotation of the auditing firms lead engagement partner, the Audit Committee and its Chairman are involved in the selection of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLPs lead engagement partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee and the Board believe that the continued retention of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP to serve as the independent external auditor is in our and our shareholders best interests and are requesting, as a matter of good corporate governance, that shareholders ratify the selection of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as the independent registered public accountants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee and the Board are not required to take any action as a result of the outcome of the vote on this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if our shareholders do not ratify the selection, the Audit Committee may investigate the reasons for our shareholders rejection and may consider whether to retain PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP or appoint another independent registered public accountant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Furthermore, even if the selection is ratified, the Audit Committee may appoint a different ndependent registered public accountant if, in its discretion, it determines that such a change would be in Mondelz nternationals and our shareholders best interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We expect that representatives of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP will be present at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They will have an opportunity to make a statement if they desire to do so and to respond to appropriate questions from shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional information about the independent registered public accountants, including the pre-approval policies and PricewaterhouseCoopers LLPs aggregate fees for services rendered for 2016 and 2015, can be found in the section on the Audit Committee beginning on page 29 of this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR THE RATIFICATION OF THE SELECTION OF PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS LLP AS MONDELZ INTERNATIONALS INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTANTS FOR FISCAL YEAR 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ITEM 3.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory Vote to Approve Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act of 2010 (the Dodd-Frank Act) and related SEC rules, and consistent with our shareholders preference (as indicated by vote at our 2011 Annual Meeting), the Board adopted a policy of providing shareholders an annual vote to approve, on an advisory (non-binding) basis, the compensation of our NEOs as disclosed in this Proxy Statement (commonly known as a say-on-pay vote).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executives  including our NEOs  are critical to our success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: That is why we design our executive compensation programs to attract, retain and motivate superior executive talent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the same time, we structure our executive compensation programs to focus on shareholders interests by incenting superior sustainable long-term performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our executive compensation programs, we align pay and performance by making a significant portion of our NEOs compensation contingent on:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reaching specific annual and long-term performance measures; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: increasing shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also have strong compensation-related design and governance practices to protect our shareholders interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders can find more information about these practices under Board Committees and Membership  Human Resources and Compensation Committee and Compensation Discussion and Analysis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These practices include the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: we have substantial stock ownership and stock holding requirements for directors and executive officers that promote alignment of their interests with our shareholders interests;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: our long-term incentive program is 100% equity-based with our executives entire annual equity grant aligned with shareholders as 75% of our executives annual equity grant is in the form of performance share units and 25% is in the form of stock options;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    76
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: over 90% of our CEOs target total compensation is at-risk incentive-based pay, of which 75% is based on long-term performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: over 63% of our other NEOs target total compensation is based on long-term performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: we do not pay the tax liability associated with executive perquisites or related to benefits payable upon a double trigger event in connection with a change in control (i.e., no gross-ups);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: we employ our executive officers at will without individual severance agreements or employment contracts
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: we have significant risk mitigators, such as limits on incentive awards, use of multiple performance measures in our incentive plans, stock ownership and holding requirements, and an executive incentive compensation recoupment (clawback) policy; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: our policies prohibit hedging, pledging or short sales of Company shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage you to read the Compensation Discussion and Analysis beginning on page 36 of this Proxy Statement and the Executive Compensation Tables beginning on page 60 of this Proxy Statement to better understand the details of our NEOs compensation for 2016 and opportunities to realize compensation in the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee and the Board believe that our executive compensation programs for our NEOs serve our shareholders nterests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we ask you to vote FOR the following resolution at our Annual Meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that Mondelz Internationals shareholders approve, on an advisory basis, the compensation paid to Mondelz Internationals NEOs, as disclosed in this Proxy Statement pursuant to the SECs compensation disclosure rules, including the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, the Executive Compensation Tables and related narrative discussion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This say-on-pay vote is advisory.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, it will not be binding on Mondelz International, the Compensation Committee or the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board and Compensation Committee value our shareholders opinions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a significant percentage of our shareholders votes against the NEO compensation as disclosed in this Proxy Statement, we will consider our shareholders concerns, and the Compensation Committee will evaluate whether any actions are necessary or appropriate to address those concerns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless the Board modifies its policy of holding an advisory say-on-pay vote on an annual basis, including after taking into account the results of shareholder votes on Proposal 4 below, the next advisory say-on-pay vote will be held at our 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR THE APPROVAL OF OUR NEO COMPENSATION AS DISCLOSE THIS PROXY STATEMENT.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ITEM 4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory Vote on the Frequency of Future Advisory Votes to Approve Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Dodd-Frank Act enables shareholders to indicate at least every six years how frequently (annually, bi-annually, or tri- annually) they want to vote on an advisory basis to approve the compensation of the NEOs, as disclosed pursuant to the SECs compensation disclosure rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders last voted on frequency at the 2011 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They overwhelmingly voted for an annual say-on-pay vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Dodd-Frank Act, shareholders must again vote on the frequency of future say-on-pay votes at this Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After careful consideration, the Board determined that an annual advisory say-on-pay vote is the most appropriate choice for Mondelz International.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the reasons described below, the Board recommends that you vote for an annual advisory say-on-pay vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that shareholders should vote annually to approve NEO compensation in order to provide us timely, direct input regarding our compensation philosophy, policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, an annual advisory say-on-pay vote is consistent with our practice of seeking input from, and engaging with, our shareholders on corporate governance matters and our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    77
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When you vote on this proposal, you are choosing your preferred voting frequency  annual, bi-annual, or tri-annual.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are not voting for or against the Boards recommendation for an annual frequency for future advisory say-on-pay votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The choice of annual, bi-annual, or tri-annual interval that receives a majority of votes cast (or the highest number of votes cast if no choice receives a majority) will be the frequency selected by shareholders for the advisory vote to approve NEO compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This say-on-pay vote is advisory and not binding on Mondelz International.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, the Compensation Committee or the Board may decide that it is in the best interests of our shareholders and Mondelz International, Inc. to hold an advisory say-on-pay vote more or less frequently than that which shareholders chose.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ITEM 5: Report on Non-Recyclable Packaging
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As You Sow, 1611 Telegraph Avenue, Suite 1450, Oakland, California, 94612, as representative for Nicola Miner Revocable Trust, beneficial owner of 489 shares of Common Stock, is the proponent of the following shareholder proposal and has advised that a representative will present this proposal at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: WHEREAS: Mondelz Internationals environmental policy states the company is committed to reducing the environmental impact of our activities, preventing pollution and promoting the sustainability of the natural resources upon which we depend yet a significant amount of brand product packaging is not recyclable and new studies suggest plastic packaging that degrades in waterways is toxic to marine animals and potentially to humans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The environmental cost to society of consumer plastic products and packaging exceeds $139 billion annually, according to the American Chemistry Council.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mondelzs specific use of plastic materials incurs an estimated $115 million in annual environmental costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our iconic brands like Oreo and Chips Ahoy are increasingly packaged in flexible film or other plastic packaging, such as pouches, that are not recyclable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Using non-recyclable packaging when recyclable alternatives are available wastes valuable resources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only 14% of plastic packaging is recycled.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Billions of discarded plastic wrappers and pouches representing significant amounts of embedded energy are incinerated or lie buried in landfills.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many of these brands could be sold in recyclable fiber or plastic packaging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-recyclable packaging is more likely to be littered and carried into waterways.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the marine environment, plastics break down into small indigestible particles that birds and marine mammals mistake for food, resulting in illness and death.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A recent assessment of marine debris by a panel of the Global Environment Facility concluded that an underlying cause of debris entering oceans is design and marketing of products internationally without appropriate regard to their environmental fate or ability to be recycled in the locations where sold
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If no actions are taken, oceans are expected to contain more plastic than fish by 2050!
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: California spends nearly $500 million annually preventing trash, including packaging, from polluting beaches, rivers, and oceanfront.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Scientific studies suggest a synergistic effect between persistent toxic chemicals and plastic debris.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plastics absorb toxics such as dioxins from water and transfer them to the marine food web and potentially to human diets, increasing the risk of adverse effects to wildlife and humans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Making all packaging recyclable to the extent possible is the first step to reduce the threat posed by plastic debris in waterways.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Colgate-Palmolive, PepsiCo, Procter & Gamble, and Walmart have set public packaging recyclability goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Companies who aspire to corporate sustainability yet use these risky materials should explain why they use so much non-recyclable packaging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Companies should also work with recyclers and municipalities to assure that more recyclable packaging actually gets collected and recycled.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED: Shareowners of Mondelz International request the Board to issue a report at reasonable cost, omitting confidential information, assessing the environmental impacts of continuing to use non-recyclable brand packaging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Supporting Statement: Proponents believe the report should include an assessment of the reputational, financial, and operational risks associated with continuing to use non-recyclable brand packaging, discuss investments in packaging recycling technologies, and to the extent possible, goals and a timeline to phase out non-recyclable packaging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: BOARD OF DIRECTORS STATEMENT IN OPPOSITION TO ITEM 5
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are committed to reducing waste and conserving natural resources while safeguarding the quality and safety of our products.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continue to reduce the environmental impact of our packaging and work with external associations to find solutions to the wider global issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described below, we are also committed to communicating our progress in our Call For Well-being Progress Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    79
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Packaging elimination is a key element of our sustainability goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We focus on reducing our overall environmental impacts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To do that, we concentrate our resources on areas where we can make the most impact.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When it comes to the environmental impact of packaging, our primary target is to optimize the packaging required for our products and thereby eliminate a portion of packaging material on an ongoing basis by eliminating packaging weight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This s because many experts advise that the most effective way to reduce the environmental impact of packaging is through packaging elimination and optimization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both the European Waste Directive (http://ec.europa.eu/environment/waste/framework/) and the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (http://ec.europa.eu/environment/waste/framework/) and the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (https://www.epa.gov/smm/sustainable-materials-management-non-hazardous-materials-and-waste-management- hierarchy) place prevention at the top of the waste hierarchy and define it broadly as using less material in design and manufacture, keeping products for longer, reducing/light weighting of packaging and using less hazardous materials with the following benefits:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: saving natural resources,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: conserving energy,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reducing pollution,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reducing the toxicity of waste, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: saving money for consumers and businesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, we invest in packaging technologies that require less material to meet customer needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This helps reduce the direct material and supply chain environmental footprint and also enables environmental gains in the logistics and waste management phases of the value chain.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also analyze packaging design changes using our propriety Eco Calculator, which provides our design teams information to guide their packaging choices and optimize their design choices to minimize environmental impact.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a history of success in packaging elimination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As we disclose in our Call For Well-being Progress Report along with data from our Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) via CDP Climate and CDP Water (http://www.mondelezinternational.com/well-being/our-progress/reporting), our current goal is to eliminate 65,000 metric tonnes (MT) between 2013 and 2020 which, as we disclosed in our 2015 CDP Climate submission (CC3.2a), we estimate benefits products accounting for over 7% of our revenue.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are on target to meet this goal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, in our Call For Well-being 2015 Progress Report, we report that from 2010 to 2015, we eliminated over 45,000 MT of packaging from our supply chain, and in 2016, we eliminated another 8,000 MT. We have benchmarked our goals against our peers, and we are one of only a few consumer goods companies that set numeric goals for packaging elimination and have been able to successfully report the progress on an annual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To help us achieve our goal, globally we have hundreds of programs that contribute to packaging optimization and elimination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Examples of highlights from 2016 are as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AMEA: In chocolate packaging, we have eliminated many shippers and placed secondary packs directly on the pallet, leading to a material saving of 1,297 MT of corrugated paper.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Latin America: Primary and secondary packaging redesign forTang powdered beverages led to the following material reductions: 5% in flexible films, 12% in cartons, 19% in corrugate and 46% in trucks required to transport the finished product.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We design our packaging to ensure food safety and prevent food waste, a major contributor to overall waste globally.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The U.N. Food and Agriculture Organization estimates that approximately 30% of all food is currently wasted through the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: supply chain and by the consumer (http://www.fao.org/food-loss-and-food-waste/en/).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By comparison,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    80
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: according to Eurostats 2013 and 2014 data, within Europe, packaging accounts for approximately 3% of total waste (80 million tonnes out of a total of 2.6 billion) (http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/statistics- explained/index.php/Packaging_waste_statistics) (http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/statistics-
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: explained/index.php/Packaging_waste_statistics) (http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/statistics explained/index.php/Waste_statistics).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each tonne of food waste has a larger impact on the environment than the equivalent weight in packaging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: According to Quantis, a sustainability and life cycle assessment firm, food waste has an adverse environmental impact ten times greater than packaging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, if we reduced packaging by 10% but the resulting food waste increased by more than 1%, the overall environmental impact would be negative.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Likewise, a study published in the United Kingdom for the Advisory Committee on Packaging concluded that packaging is responsible for only 10% of the total energy consumed in food production.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Food safety is our primary focus as a global supplier of consumer food products.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For food safety and quality reasons, we cannot use post-consumer recycled materials for the majority of our packaging that comes into direct contact with food.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is governed by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and European Commission legislation in order to protect the health of consumers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We aim to deliver consumers expectations for safety, quality and consistency of product by designing our packages to protect product integrity and performance and extend product shelf life, wherever it makes sense to do so.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Packaging is a small portion of our overall environmental impact, and a significant majority of our packaging is already either recycled or recyclable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our LCA has shown that:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Agriculture, operations and packaging contribute to our end-to-end environmental footprint.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our impact from operations is much smaller than from agriculture, as we report in our Call For Well-being 2015 Progress Report, page 9
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Packaging is a small proportion of our operations impact
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant portion of our portfolio is comprised of global brands, so packaging design and utilization is similar across regions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The majority of our packaging is already either currently recycled or designed to be recyclable if a collection and recycling infrastructure is in place.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Within Europe, our largest region, over 75% of our packaging is paper-based, glass or metal, all of which are either currently recycled or recyclable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, approximately 70% of our paper-based packaging is from recycled sources, and we manufacture over 60% of our products in factories that send zero waste to landfill.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The remaining 25% of that packaging is predominately thin flexible films, which are optimized to provide physical and environmental protection to the food throughout its shelf life and limit food waste and spoilage.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We optimize these films where possible to either single webs or laminates made with only one material type (for example polypropylene).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These films are already in principle designed to facilitate recyclability if collection and sortation is possible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over 80% of these films already meet these criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we are continuing to move the remainder of our flexible packaging to single material substrates where possible without risk to the quality or shelf life of the product.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, we have recently moved the majority of our single serve chocolates from twist wrap to flow pack films, which are single web polypropylene materials that offer more potential for recycling than complex laminations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recognize concerns about the build-up of plastics in the environment from the use of non-recyclable materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the American Chemistry Council (ACC) and Trucost indicate an environmental cost for plastics of $139 billion in 2015 (https://plastics.americanchemistry.com/Plastics-and-Sustainability.pdf), they also state that alternatives to plastics in packaging would have a negative impact almost four times greater due to the efficiency of the design of current plastic
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: packaging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    81
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We engage with trade associations, suppliers and peers to find industry-wide solutions for the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Smithers Pira indicates that the global packaging market is valued at $839 billion in 2015 (http://www.smitherspira.com/news/2016/february/global-packaging-material-outlooks).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We estimate that we account for less than 0.25% of this value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is therefore essential that any initiatives to identify ways to recycle packaging are done collaboratively with industry partners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We work with the solid waste working group of the Consumer Goods Forum (CGF) on the issue of packaging waste.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CGF supports the efforts of the Ocean Conservancys Trash Free Seas Alliance and the ACC to identify the most effective and efficient solutions to managing waste in regions of the world that are known to contribute most significantly to plastic leakage into oceans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Increased use of recycled and recyclable materials plays a part in this, as does the provision of a harmonized public waste infrastructure across regions and promotion of responsible consumer behavior.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have also engaged our suppliers to identify ways to recycle or use recycled materials while maintaining food safety standards for our products.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant part of our flexible films are BOPP films (biaxially oriented polypropylene), which our suppliers already internally reclaim as part of their own manufacturing process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Conclusion
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Proposals request for a report assessing the environmental impact of nonrecyclable brand packaging beyond what we already provide is not an effective use of the Companys resources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD RECOMMENDS A VOTE AGAINST THIS SHAREHOLDER PROPOSAL.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    82
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ITEM 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Create a Committee to Prepare a Report Regarding the Impact of Plant Closures on Communities and Alternatives
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AFL-CIO Reserve Fund, 815 16th Street, NW, Washington, DC 20006, beneficial owner of 918 shares of Common Stock, s the proponent of the following shareholder proposal and has advised that a representative will present this proposal at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED: Shareholders of Mondelz International, Inc. (Mondelz), hereby request that the Board of Directors create a committee, with members drawn from representatives of the employee work force and the management of Mondelz, to prepare a report regarding the impact on communities from the closure of Mondelz manufacturing facilities and alternatives that can be developed to help mitigate the impact of such closures in the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The report shall be prepared at reasonable cost and omit proprietary information, and shall be made available on the Mondelz website no later than the 2018 annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Supporting Statement: Over the past two decades Mondelz has closed or sharply reduced the size of a significant number of plants across the United States and Canada.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Large manufacturing facilities, employing hundreds at each location, were shuttered in Pittsburgh, Houston, Philadelphia, Toronto, and Buena Park, among others.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Much of that production went to non-union third party suppliers in the United States, as well as to two manufacturing facilities in Mexico.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of these plant closures, total Mondelz employment in the United States and Canada has been cut dramatically.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Almost without exception, these closed plants had been in operation for upward of 50 years and were located in communities where Mondelz was one of the primary employers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees who have lost their jobs as a result of these plant closures had often been employees with Mondelz for decades.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many of these former employees were not able to gain comparable employment and were forced to take low wage jobs, retire early but at a lower pension rate, or move to another town or city in the hope of better economic opportunity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mondelz has been going through successive restructuring programs in an effort to achieve cost savings and improve profit margins.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A major focus of those programs has been to reduce manufacturing costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To that end, Mondelz has prioritized the installation of Lines of the Future in select manufacturing facilities, including at a new $500 million plant in Salinas, Mexico.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By putting the new production lines in Salinas, Mondelz shed 600 production jobs at its facility in southeast Chicago.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This trend is not just isolated to North America.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mondelzs restructuring programs have also affected Europe, Britain, Asia and Latin America.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For these reasons, it is imperative that attention be paid to the impact of these closures on the communities in which the plants are located.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is particularly true given the close relationship between Mondelz and the communities where it has been operating for many years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Establishing the proposed committee will be a first step toward understanding the impact of future plant closings, and the consideration of alternatives that can be developed to help mitigate the impact of such plant closures in the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For these reasons, we urge shareholders to vote FOR this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: BOARD OF DIRECTORS STATEMENT IN OPPOSITION TO ITEM 6
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board understands that job loss due to corporate decisions to close, to sell, or to reduce employment levels at a Company plant can create dislocation for our employees, their families and our communities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When making these decisions, we consider a wide variety of factors  including the impact our decision might have on our employees, our communities and our other stakeholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In implementing our decisions, we seek to mitigate adverse impacts on our employees and communities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that our existing approach to decision-making is increasing our competitiveness while appropriately addressing the proponents concerns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board does not believe that forming an employee-management committee to produce a report to the Board on plant closures (as requested by the proponents)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: would enhance our decision-making process or would benefit our employees, our communities or you, our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends that you vote AGAINST this shareholder proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    83
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Supply Chain Reinvention Is Necessary to Enhance our Competitiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When we started our Supply Chain Reinvention journey in 2012, our supply chain was at a competitive disadvantage.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our manufacturing footprint was built through acquisition and as such, was fragmented, complex and inefficient.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through Supply Chain Reinvention, we have taken important and necessary steps to modernize and increase efficiencies in our supply chain  paying particular attention to our manufacturing capabilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It makes sense for a global company like ours to optimize our manufacturing footprint, making it both more efficient and consistent with our sales footprint and end markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some of the plants that we have closed or sold were old and subscale and had not seen significant investment in decades, requiring meaningful ongoing maintenance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some plants we acquired in strategic acquisitions that brought us notable brands and other important assets, but also brought antiquated plants in locations that were not a good fit with our larger, more productive supply chain and evolving strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our selective and thoughtful modernization process positions us to win in todays competitive market and for the long-term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over time, our consumers tastes change, our customers needs evolve, we enter or exit markets, and other factors impact our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We must adapt our manufacturing footprint in order to respond and remain competitive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our goals for Supply Chain Reinvention are to significantly increase our productivity, expand our margins and generate cash to fuel investments in our growth as well as return capital to shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have made considerable progress toward those goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have moved much of our production to advantaged equipment in locations with appropriate scale, enabling us to further leverage supplier partnerships and optimize logistics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have improved our product quality and customer service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have reduced our energy consumption and carbon footprint, and can conduct our business in a more environmentally responsible manner  ultimately benefitting our communities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also, we are building key capabilities of our employees across our plants, not just at those with advantaged equipment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our goal is to build our employees capabilities with skills and training that they can take and apply anywhere.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are Committed to Helping Impacted Employees and Communities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When making and implementing Supply Chain Reinvention decisions that impact employees, we comply with applicable local laws and work with union representatives and works councils (where we have an obligation to consult or bargain).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also strive to mitigate potential adverse impacts on our employees, our communities and other stakeholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: More specifically:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plant Automation: When we increase automation at a plant, we typically invest heavily in additional training s that continuing employees can learn the new skills they need to operate and leverage our new technology.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plant Closure or Staff Reduction: If it becomes necessary to close a plant or reduce staff at a plant, we provide impacted employees with resources and benefits consistent with or better than those required by applicable local law or applicable contractual requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These may include, but are not limited to, termination pay, outplacement assistance, retraining and continuation of various benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees who participate in one of our pension plans may also be eligible, based on age and years of service, for early retirement benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We partner with governmental authorities to provide assistance and re-training to impacted employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When practical, we also share information about available opportunities at other Company facilities with impacted employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plant Sale: If we are selling a plant, we are sometimes able to negotiate for the buyer to hire impacted employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For impacted employees who do not have an opportunity to continue employment with us or the buyer, we typically offer a comprehensive separation package  consistent with or better than applicable local law or contractual requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When we decide to close, to sell, or to reduce employment levels at a Company plant, we work in good faith with governmental authorities and others in the community to help minimize potential adverse effects on the community.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Boards Recommendation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through Supply Chain Reinvention, we are building an integrated supply chain focused on delivering sustainable competitive advantage for the Company and you, its shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do this in a way that is mindful of employees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    84
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: and communities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board does not believe that forming an employee-management committee to produce a report to the Board on plant closures (as requested by the proponents) would enhance our decision-making process or facilitate progress toward our goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For these reasons, the Board recommends that you vote AGAINST this shareholder proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD RECOMMENDS A VOTE AGAINST THIS SHAREHOLDER PROPOSAL.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board established March 8, 2017 as the record date (the Record Date) for the Annual Meeting.

sentences.text: Each shareholder (registered or beneficial) who held shares of Common Stock at the close of business on the Record Date is entitled to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) receive notice of the Annual Meeting,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) attend the Annual Meeting and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) vote on all matters that properly come before the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each shareholder may appoint only one proxy holder or representative to attend the Annual Meeting on his or her behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the close of business on the Record Date, 1,524,504,891 shares of Common Stock were outstanding and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share is entitled to one vote on each matter to be voted upon at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Why did I receive these proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You received these proxy materials (via mail, email or the Internet) because, as of the Record Date, you directly or indirectly held, and had the right to vote, shares of Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with the Boards solicitation of proxies to be voted at the Annual Meeting, we are providing shareholders entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting with this Proxy Statement, the 2016 Form 10-K and a proxy card or VIF.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are providing your proxy card in the form of a paper card or unique control number that allows you to provide your proxy voting instructions via the Internet or by phone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We refer to these materials collectively as the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These materials provide important information about Mondelz International and describe the voting procedures and the matters to be voted on at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. What is the difference between registered shareholders and beneficial shareholders?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who hold Mondelz International stock directly with our stock registrar and transfer agent, Wells Fargo Bank, N.A., are registered shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder, the proxy distributors will send the proxy materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: directly to you, and your vote instructs the proxies how to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    85
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who hold stock indirectly through an account with an institutional or other nominee holder of stock, such as a broker or bank, are referred to as beneficial shareholders or shareholders in street name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial shareholder, your broker, bank or other nominee delivers the proxy materials to you, and your vote instructs your nominee how to vote your shares; your nominee in turn instructs the proxies how to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares beneficially in an employee benefit plan, your shares are voted by the trustee of the plan per your instructions and otherwise in accordance with the plans governing documents and applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. How is Mondelz International distributing proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are furnishing proxy materials to our shareholders primarily via Notice and Access delivery.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On or about March 28, 2017, we mailed to our shareholders (other than those who previously requested email or paper delivery) a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the Notice) containing instructions on how to access the proxy materials via the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you receive the Notice by mail, you will not receive a printed copy of the proxy materials in the mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, the Notice instructs you on how to access the proxy materials and vote by going to a secure website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received the Notice by mail and would like to receive paper copies of the proxy materials in the mail on a one-time or ongoing basis, you may follow the instructions in the Notice for making this request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received the Notice by mail and would like to receive an electronic copy of the proxy materials by email on a one-time or ongoing basis, you may follow the instructions in the Notice for making this request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice is not a proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You cannot use it to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. How may I request printed copies of the proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will send printed, paper copies of proxy materials, including the 2016 Form 10-K, free of charge to any shareholder who requests copies in writing to: Investor Relations, Mondelz International, Inc., Three Parkway North, Deerfield, Illinois 60015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders may also request copies of these materials using one of the following methods:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By telephone: Call free of charge 1-800-579-1639 in the United States and Canada.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Via the Internet: Access the Internet and go to www.proxyvote.com and follow the instructions to log in and order copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can select from the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: your preference to receive
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) printed materials via mail or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) an e-mail with links to the electronic materials; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: if you would like your election to apply to the delivery of materials for all future meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Via e-mail: Please send a blank e-mail to sendmaterial@proxyvote.com with the 16-digit control number tha is printed in the box marked by the arrow in the subject line.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These materials are also available at http://materials.proxyvote.com/609207.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

I am a participant in the Altria Deferred Profit Sharing Plan for Hourly Employees, the Altria Deferred Profit Sharing Plan for Salaried Employees, the Philip Morris International Deferred Profit-Sharing Plan or the Miller Coors LLC Employees Retirement & Savings Plan and have investments in the Mondelz International Stock Fund(s).

sentences.text: In order to direct the plan trustee how to vote the shares held in your Mondelz International Stock Fund account(s), you must vote these plan shares (whether by Internet, telephone or mailed proxy card) by 11:59 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EDT on May 12, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the trustee(s) does not receive your voting instructions or proxy card by that time, the trustee(s) will vote the shares allocated to your account(s) in the same proportion as the respective plan shares for which the trustee timely received voting instructions, unless doing so would be contrary to the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please follow the instructions for registered shareholders described in Question 12 below to cast your vote.

sentences.text: Note that although you may attend the Annual Meeting, you may not vote shares held in your Mondelz International Stock Fund account(s) at the Annual Meeting.

sentences.text: 8. How do I vote if I participate in Mondelz Internationals Direct Purchase Plan?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold shares in the Direct Purchase Plan, follow the instructions for registered shareholders described in Question 12 below to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When you vote those shares, you will be voting all the shares you hold at our transfer agent as a registered shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not vote your shares, they will not be voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PLEASE VOTE.

sentences.text: 9. I hold CREST Depository Interests (CDIs) that represent entitlements to shares of Common Stock as a result of Mondelz Internationals acquisition of Cadbury in 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I vote the shares of Common Stock underlying my CDIs?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If so, how do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Computershare Investor Services Plc (Computershare) will send all CREST Participants (including nominee companies and sponsored individuals) that hold CDIs a notice and Form of Instruction that allow these participants to attend and vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your CDIs in CREST, you can vote the underlying shares by completing and sending the Form of Instruction to the Voting Agent, Computershare, or via CREST as detailed on the Form of Instruction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Computershare must receive your vote by 3:00 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: London time on May 11, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Computershare will then lodge the vote for the underlying shares with the Registrar and your vote will be included in the final tally for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If Computershare holds your CDIs on your behalf within Mondelz International Corporate Sponsored Nominee Service, Computershare, as the international nominee for your CDIs, will send you a notice and Form of Direction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may direct Computershare how to vote your underlying shares via the Internet or by returning your Form of Direction according to the instructions in the notice and Form of Direction by 3:00 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: London time on May 10, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Computershare will then arrange to vote your underlying shares according to your instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would like to attend and vote in person at the Annual Meeting, please inform Computershare, which will provide you with a letter of representation with respect to your CDIs that will enable you to attend and vote your underlying shares at the Annual Meeting on Computershares behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If another international nominee holds your CDIs on your behalf, your nominee may have its own arrangements in place to provide you with a separate notice of the Annual Meeting and proxy voting card with respect to your underlying shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that case, please follow your nominees voting instructions in that notice and proxy voting card to direct your nominee how to vote your underlying shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please vote by the deadline stated on the nominees notice and proxy voting card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold CDIs and have questions about voting your shares of Common Stock underlying your CDIs, please contact Computershare at +44 (0)344 472 6005.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 10. May I change or revoke my vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder, any subsequent vote you cast will replace your earlier vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This applies whether you vote by mailing a proxy card or via the telephone or Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also revoke an earlier vote by voting in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Alternatively, you may revoke your proxy by submitting a written revocation to the Corporate Secretary at Mondelz International, Inc., Three Parkway North, Deerfield, Illinois 60015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial shareholder, you must contact your broker, bank or other nominee for specific instructions on how to change or revoke your vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 11. What is the quorum requirement for the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum of shareholders is necessary to validly hold the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum will be present if a majority of the outstanding shares of Common Stock entitled to vote as of the Record Date is represented at the Annual Meeting, either in person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes (described in Question 15 below) will be counted for the purpose of determining whether a quorum is present for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 13. What vote is needed to elect directors?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be elected in an uncontested election such as at this Annual Meeting, a director nominee must receive a majority of the votes cast  i.e., more votes FOR than AGAINST.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes (described in Question 15 below) are not considered as votes cast and will have no effect on the vote outcome for these matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In an uncontested election, if an incumbent director nominated for re-election receives a greater number of votes AGAINST than votes FOR, the director must tender his or her resignation to the Governance Committee for its consideration following certification of the election results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee then will recommend to the Board whether to accept the resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The director will continue to serve until the Board decides whether to accept the resignation, but will not participate in the committees recommendation or the Boards action regarding whether to accept the resignation offer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board considers all factors it deems relevant to the Companys best interests and will publicly disclose its decision and rationale within 90 days after certification of the election results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Board does not accept the directors resignation, the director will continue to serve until the next annual meeting of shareholders or until the directors successor is duly elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    88
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 14. What vote is needed to approve the other proposals?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of each of Item 2 (Ratification of the Selection of the Independent Registered Public Accountants), Item 3 (Advisory Vote to Approve Executive Compensation), Item 4 (Advisory Vote on the Frequency of an Executive Compensation Vote) and Items 5 and 6 (Shareholder Proposals) also requires a majority of votes cast  i.e., more votes FOR than AGAINST.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes (described in Question 15 below) are not considered as votes cast and will have no effect on the vote outcome for Items 3, 4, 5 and 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There should be no broker non-votes with respect to Item 2 because this is a routine matter under stock exchange rules (described in Question 15 below).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 15. What are broker non-votes?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial shareholder, your vote instructs your broker, bank or other nominee, as the holder of record, how to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under stock exchange rules, if you do not provide voting instructions to your broker, bank or other nominee, your nominee has discretion to vote your shares only on matters classified as routine under stock exchange rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ratification of the selection of the independent registered public accountants (Item 2) is the only item on the agenda for the Annual Meeting that is routine under stock exchange rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not provide voting instructions to your broker or other nominee, your nominee may vote your shares only on Item 2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that case, your shares will count toward the quorum for the Annual Meeting and be voted on Item 2, but they will not be voted on Items 1, 3, 4, 5 and 6 and any other matters that may come to vote at the Annual Meeting, resulting in broker non-votes in an amount equivalent to your shares with respect to these items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 16. Who bears the cost of soliciting votes for the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company bears the cost of soliciting your vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys directors, officers or employees may solicit proxies or votes in person, by telephone or by electronic communication.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They will not receive any additional compensation for these solicitation activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will enlist the help of banks, brokers and other nominee holders in soliciting proxies for the Annual Meeting from their customers (i.e., beneficial shareholders) and reimburse those firms for related out-of-pocket expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We retained Mackenzie Partners, Inc. to aid in soliciting votes for the Annual Meeting for a fee not to exceed $15,000 plus reasonable expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 17. What is Householding?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have adopted householding procedures that allow us to deliver proxy materials more cost-effectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial shareholders and you and other residents at your mailing address share the same last name and also own shares of Common Stock in an account at the same broker, bank or other nominee, your nominee delivered a single Notice or set of proxy materials to your address.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This method of delivery is known as householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Householding reduces the number of mailings you receive, saves on printing and postage costs and helps the environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders participating in householding continue to receive separate proxy cards and control numbers for voting electronically.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will deliver promptly a separate copy of the Notice or proxy materials to a shareholder at a shared address to which a single copy was delivered.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A shareholder who received a single Notice or set of proxy materials to a shared address may request a separate copy of the Notice or proxy materials be sent to him or her by contacting in writing Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (Broadridge), Householding Department at 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York, 11717, or calling 1- 800-542-1061.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would like to opt out of householding for future deliveries of proxy materials, please contact your broker, bank or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial shareholders who share an address and receive multiple copies of the proxy materials but want to receive only a single copy of these materials in the future should contact their broker, bank or other nominee and make this request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder or hold your shares in an employee benefit plan, we sent you and each registered or plan shareholder at your address separate Notices or sets of proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MONDELZ INTERNATIONAL    89
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents

sentences.text: 18. Are my votes confidential?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your votes will not be disclosed to the directors, officers or employees, except:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: as necessary to meet applicable legal requirements and to assert or defend claims for or against us;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: in the case of a contested proxy solicitation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: if you provide a comment with your proxy or otherwise communicate your vote to us outside of the normal procedures; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: as necessary to allow the inspector of election to certify the results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 19. Who counts the votes and certifies the voting results?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broadridge will receive and tabulate the proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of IVS, Inc. will act as the inspectors of election and will certify the results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 23. May I ask questions at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I submit my question in advance of the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders will have the opportunity to ask questions or make comments related to the matters being voted on and more generally about the Company and business.

sentences.text: They may do so at the times indicated in the Annual Meeting agenda and meeting procedures that we will distribute at the Annual Meeting registration desk and according to the Chairmans instructions.

sentences.text: Shareholder Nominations and Proposals for the 2018 Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders should mail all nominations and proposals to the Corporate Secretary at Mondelz International, Inc., Three Parkway North, Deerfield, Illinois 60015.

sentences.text: You may obtain a copy of the By-Laws from the Corporate Secretary (please make a written request to the same address) or www.mondelezinternational.com/investors/corporate-governance.

sentences.text: Shareholder Nominations of a Candidate for Election as a Director or Shareholder Proposal of Business for Considerations at an Annual Meeting of Shareholders (not for inclusion in the Companys 2018 proxy materials)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the By-Laws, a shareholder may nominate a candidate for election as a director or propose business for consideration at an annual meeting of shareholders (but, in either case, not for inclusion in the proxy materials) by delivering written notice that contains certain required information to the Corporate Secretary and otherwise complying with other requirements included in our By-Laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
